name: helloworld
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.prepare: mkdir -p www/ && cd web && npm install
scripts.start: cd web && npm run link-and-compile && react-scripts build && cp -R ./build/ ../www && cordova serve
scripts.start-ios: cd web && npm link @aerogear/datasync-js && react-scripts build && cp -R ./build/ ../www && cordova emulate ios --buildFlag='-UseModernBuildSystem=0'
scripts.start-android: cd web && npm link @aerogear/datasync-js && react-scripts build && cp -R ./build/ ../www && cordova run android

author: Apache Cordova Team
